title: Ron Funches’ Holiday Spectacular
description:
With the holidays approaching, comedian Ron Funches talks to Nikki about his comedic style, his family, and what it’s like to navigate telling jokes during the pandemic.

Follow Ron Funches on Twitter and Instagram 

Buy tickets for Ron’s holiday special A Very Funches Christmas on Eventbrite!

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
